TopicTitle: large decouplers, looking for the fix

Articles.Content:
I need to change the physics setting on the large decouplers because they are not behaving properly. There was a post concerning this. My search-fu is weak and I'm not able to locate it. Anybody have the link?

Edited July 23, 2015 by Sobriquet

You're talking about the TR-38-D and how it fires one per spacebar tap, right?

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Parts/Structural/Size3Decoupler/part.cfg

There's the stock .cfg, delete the line "PhysicsSignificance = 1" in your own file, that did the trick for me.

*sigh* that junk. Weaker than standard decouplers, and a kraken bait to boot. I really wonder what motivated Squad to make it behave that way instead of making it a standard decoupler like all the rest.
